title: South African Leader Unveils Anticorruption Plans, but Doubts Follow
description: President Cyril Ramaphosa presented measures that would place even himself and his cabinet under scrutiny. But some analysts question whether the plan will be carried out.
dc:creator: John Eligon
media:description: President Cyril Ramaphosa of South Africa came to power after the scandal-plagued Zuma years and was seen as someone who could right the ship, an analyst said.
